audioText: Depuis son arrivée au bar, il ne cesse de parler de son combat personnel
question: What has he been doing since arriving at the bar?
options: Talking constantly about his personal struggle
explanation: The text states 'Depuis son arrivée au bar, il ne cesse de parler de son combat personnel' - Since his arrival at the bar, he hasn't stopped talking about his personal struggle. 'Ne cesse de' means 'doesn't stop' and 'combat personnel' means 'personal struggle'.
